阵雪-阵雪是气象学上的专业术语,指降落时间短促,开始和终止都较突然的雪。-zhenxue...  阵雪阵雪阵雪(showery snow) 降落时间短促,开始和终止都较突然的雪。 阵雪.

entry.def: If the weather is showery, there are showers of rain but it does not rain all the time.

means.word_mean: 1. (of weather) wet by periods of rain;

auth_sentence.content: On Thursday, a showery air-mass follows behind the second low, leading to some heavy showers.
